thread.title: Cryptocurrency 'noob' details wild ride with digital coins

title: Cryptocurrency 'noob' details wild ride with digital coins
text:
Cryptocurrency 'noob' details wild ride with digital coins 5:54am EST - 02:22 
Personal finance writer J.R. Duren researched digital currencies for his work but found himself hopping on the bitcoin bandwagon, and it's been a bumpy ride. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Personal finance writer J.R. Duren researched digital currencies for his work but found himself hopping on the bitcoin bandwagon, and it's been a bumpy ride. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2EVkqrm
